content:
path /v3/ethereum/transaction/count/address
operationId EthGetTransactionCount
parameters
description address
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
maxLength 42
minLength 42
description Type of Ethereum testnet Defaults to ethereumsepolia
in header
name xtestnettype
required False
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary Get count of outgoing Ethereum transactions
description 1 credit per API call
Get a number of outgoing Ethereum transactions for the address When a transaction is sent there can be multiple outgoing transactions
which are not yet processed by the blockchain To distinguish between them there is a counter called a nonce which represents
the order of the transaction in the list of outgoing transactions
responses
200
schema
type number
description Number of transactions that were made from this address Can be used as a nonce parameter in send transaction calls
description OK
